tool_description: Definitions on characteristics of your favorite cuisines
name: Food Recipe Finder
title: Food Recipe Finder

api_list.name: Ingredients by Flavor
api_list.description: This will return ingredients used to achieve a particular flavor in a cuisine type
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-recipe-finder2.p.rapidapi.com/cuisine/mexican/spice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-recipe-finder2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://food-recipe-finder2.p.rapidapi.com/cuisine/{category}/{flavor}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-recipe-finder2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
